reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made, cute, and incredibly soft, with one noting it pairs perfectly with leggings or skinny jeans. The color is accurate to the picture, and customers appreciate its thickness and comfort, with one mentioning it's not scratchy. While some it's not too oversized, others note it runs a bit large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy The Sweaterâ€¼ï¸
items.body: Awesome purchase! My normal size is a medium to large in tops. I ordered a medium and it fits like a dream! Nice quality sweater. Not too thick but definitely know itâ€™s a sweater. Iâ€™m hot natured but did not get too hot wearing it at work in a classroom. The color matched the color description. Itâ€™s trendy & stylish & can be worn casually or you can dress it up. Love the boxy oversized look but itâ€™s not too over sized to make it uncomfortable. Read more
items.author: Tbrink

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits great and seems higher quality
items.author: Julia and Jeff

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars true to size
items.body: GAH! New favorite fall staple. Bought this with a high waisted skirt and I'm amazed as the quality of this sweater. It is a longer cropped sweater but the color is so rich and the sweater itself is quality material. It's soft, warm and stretchy. I would order your usual size since it is an "over sized" fit. Read more
items.author: Nicole

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Iâ€™d buy it again
items.body: This sweater is actually better inside out. I donâ€™t care for the design that assembles things with the seams on the outside. I understand thatâ€™s how itâ€™s supposed to look- but thatâ€™s just dumb. I turned it inside out, used a seam ripper to remove the labels and it looks way better. Quality, nice and thick, material is soft and comfy. Perfect amount of stretch and it hangs nicely on your body. Size runs true . No weird smells. Color is accurate. I got a small and it fits perfect- loosely but not too big Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft, so good, you need this!

Iâ€™m always hesitant buying clothes off Amazon, because you never know what youâ€™re going to get, yano? Im obsessed because not only is this sweater super cute, itâ€™s incredibly soft, washes easy, has a tighter hand cuff at the wrist, goes with multiple outfits & most importantly, isnâ€™t itchy. I canâ€™t stand itchy sweaters or sweaters that are too hot. Truly a win & I would absolutely buy another and recommend it over and over. If youâ€™re in the market for your next new outfit, this is the sweater! Read more

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Had really high hopes for this sweater but it was just blah
items.body: I had really high hopes for this sweater but after trying it on, it was just blah. Not super soft but not super uncomfortable either. Medium weight and seems to be okay quality. Scared to wash though Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Material
items.body: This sweater is beautiful. I purchased the red apricot color. Not sure why itâ€™s called that color. Color is exactly as pictured. I normally do not purchased non brand mane clothing but thought I would give it a try because of all the reviews. Glad I did. Read more
items.author: Norma Dodson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10/10 Sweater. New Favorite!
items.body: This sweater is a total winner. Iâ€™m wearing a Medium in the Rust color and itâ€™s exactly as shown. The color is rich, warm, and super flattering. The crop is that perfect modest cropâ€¦ hits right at the waistband so you can show your jeans or belt without feeling exposed. The batwing sleeves and the long ribbed cuffs make it look more elevated than a basic sweater. The ribbed knit feels medium weight, soft, and high quality. No itch and super comfy. I wore this to Thanksgiving and got multiple compliments. My new fave sweater!! For reference, Iâ€™m 5â€™7, 170 pounds, athletic build, and usually wear a size Large. Read more
items.author: Val Cannon

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Rust, White, Red Apricot, Blue, Pink Khaki, Burgundy, Apricot, Black, Caramel, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
